transport.question: I have wheels and you sit in me. I take you places on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 You can go on a trip in me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 📣 I make a loud noise when I move.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places.
I float on water and can take you across the sea.
I have two wheels and you push me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park.
🚳 You need a helmet to be safe.

transport.question: I am like a car, but I can carry lots of people. I stop to pick people up.

hints.text: 🚌 I often have a yellow color.

transport.question: I am a fast car used by police officers.

hints.text: 🚔 You might see me chasing bad guys.

transport.question: I carry firefighters and water to put out fires.

hints.text: 🔥 I help stop fires from spreading.
🚨 I have flashing lights and a siren.

transport.question: I go underwater and explore the ocean's depths.

hints.text: 🐠 I can see fish out of my windows.
🧭 People use me for exploration underwater.

transport.question: I can fly but I don't have wings, and I spin my top to take off.

hints.text: ⚕️ I can rescue people in emergencies.
➕ Some are painted with a red cross.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: I am a favorite snack for rabbits.

plant.question: I have a stem, petals, and smell sweet. Bees love me! What am I?
I am tall and have a trunk. Birds make nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: I provide shade on a sunny day.
My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and green, and I grow on a vine. You can slice me up for a salad. What am I?

hints.text: I am juicy and cool on a hot day.
Some people put me on sandwiches.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and have a hard shell. Sometimes I fall to the ground. What am I?

hints.text: I am a type of nut.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be very prickly. I live in the desert and don't need much water. What am I?

hints.text: I often have spines or needles.
I grow in dry, hot places.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall stalk. You can eat me as a vegetable and it is yellow. What am I?

hints.text: You can pop me and eat me at the movies.

plant.question: I am a group of trees growing close together. Sometimes you can get lost in me! What am I?

hints.text: You might find bears and deer here.
You need a map to explore me!

plant.question: I am a green plant that grows in water. Fish like to swim around in me. What am I?

hints.text: I provide food and shelter for marine life.
I am found in oceans, lakes, and rivers.

plant.question: I am a very large flower with a huge stem, and make a tasty cooking oil and seeds that people and birds like to eat. What am I?

hints.text: I am named after the sun.
My head turns to face the sun throughout the day.
